import{getContract}from'utils/web3';import rabbitmintingfarm from'config/abi/rabbitmintingfarm.json';import pancakeRabbits from'config/abi/pancakeRabbits.json';import{RABBIT_MINTING_FARM_ADDRESS,PANCAKE_RABBITS_ADDRESS}from'config/constants/nfts';// TODO: Figure out how to add current account to contracts to write methods can be used
export var getRabbitMintingContract=function getRabbitMintingContract(contractOptions){var rabbitMintingFarmAbi=rabbitmintingfarm;return getContract(rabbitMintingFarmAbi,RABBIT_MINTING_FARM_ADDRESS,contractOptions);};export var getPancakeRabbitContract=function getPancakeRabbitContract(contractOptions){var pancakeRabbitsAbi=pancakeRabbits;return getContract(pancakeRabbitsAbi,PANCAKE_RABBITS_ADDRESS,contractOptions);};export default getRabbitMintingContract;
